Title: Oni Chichi 2: Harvest
Description:
['Appalled by her father Kenichi's carnal desires in targeting her younger sisters, Haruka Makino decides to become a "sacrifice" and sate her father's incestuous libido alone. However, instead of solving the problem, her sisters begin to think that Haruka really plans to seize their father all for herself.', '
